name: Pringles: Fangame
description:
Pringles: Fangame is a recreation / expansion of Future Drive's 2009 Homebrew game "Pringles Game" for the Sega Genesis.

The game aims to recreate the basic mechanics and levels of Pringles Game, have them run at a crisp 60fps, along with a level editor to create and share custom levels.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys or A and D: Move

R: Restart Level

Esc: Pause game (Close game at level completion)

Space: Next level at Level Completion

I'd greatly appreciate your feedback!
